Class JIPipePlotSeriesBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.jipipe.ui.plotbuilder.JIPipePlotSeriesBuilder

    JIPipeValidatable, JIPipeParameterCollection

    public class JIPipePlotSeriesBuilder
extends Object
implements JIPipeParameterCollection, JIPipeValidatable
